c74object.name: hoa.pi
c74object.description: hoa.pi is for people that never remember more than 4 decimals or want to initialize a good Pi number.

metadatalist.metadata: Julien Colafrancesco, Pierre Guillot, Eliott Paris.

inlet.digest: bang to output π, set the π multiplier

objarg.name: multiplier
objarg.description: First argument is the π multiplier

method.name: bang
method.description: The bang message compute and output result : pi * factor.

method.name: dblclick
method.description: The dblclick on the object compute and output result

method.name: float
method.digest: Set pi multiplier, and compute result
method.description: The float message et pi multiplier, and compute the result

method.name: int
method.digest: Set pi multiplier, and compute result
method.description: The int message et pi multiplier, and compute the result

c74object.discussion: hoa.pi is for people that never remember more than 4 decimals or want to initialize a good Pi number.
